channel.title: Wakhee Ahmed on Wakhee's musings
channel.description: Recent content in Wakhee Ahmed on Wakhee's musings

item.title: A critique of democracy
item.description: Just to make things clear: I believe that democracy is indeed the right form of government in many countries at the present. But at the same time I feel we need to discuss some of it’s de-merits and undetstand it’s limitations so that we can create a governemt that better serves the public.

item.title: Why create a website
item.description: I was tired of just consuming content and not creating anything that was my own, original and personal. Youtube was an option, but I felt that the barrier of entry was pretty high, with all the requirments like good microphone, lighting, etc. to create decent content. The bigger issue was that I felt the video format was not suitable to constantly update and ideas and was not the most accessible even.

item.title: Contact
item.description: Any constructive criticisms? Liked what you read? Have an opposing view? Learned something new? Feel free to share! Your Name Email Address An email address is required. Message
